snippet: Argentines are eager, and desperate, to direct their money out of their country and into real estate in Miami and New York.
abstract: Big Deal column; economic uncertainty at home has spurred Argentines to direct their money out of their country and into real estate in Miami and New York; they have bypassed Brazilians as the most active group from Latin America buying Miami real estate.

byline.contributor: Charles Newbery contributed reporting from Buenos Aires.

lead_paragraph: Argentines are eager, and desperate, to direct their money out of their country and into real estate in Miami and New York.

headline.print_headline: Argentines Turn Cash Into Condos In Miami
headline.main: Argentines Turn Cash Into Condos in Miami
